lines.text: Let me get this straight, Ms. Bankhead. Are you asking me to leave your home?
Throwing you out would be more accurate.
Well, I have been thrown out of better places than this!
You have never been in better places than this!
Oh, so am I. That's why I call everybody darling.
But how's Ricky ever going to find out who took the pearls?
He'll ask me and I'll confess.
Because while he's asking me, he'll have his fingers around my throat!
